title: David
provenance_text:
Jean Ipousteguy [1920-2006], Paris, France; Galerie Claude Bernard, Paris, France, until January 1962; acquired by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1962.

Notes:
[1]. The sculpture was included (no. 173, illustrated in the catalogue) in "The 1961 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961 - January 1962. It was lent by Galerie Claude Bernard.
[2]. The sculpture was purchased by Carnegie Institute from the International as a gift from an anonymous donor. Payment was sent on December 20, 1961. Galerie Claude Bernard acknowledged receipt of payment on January 27, 1962. The sculpture was accessioned on February 15, 1962.
